name: spotify-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server that connects Claude to Spotify for music control and discovery
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that enables Claude to interact with Spotify. Features include playback control (play, pause, skip), music discovery with enhanced search using Last.fm and MusicBrainz metadata, playlist management, queue control, and smart authentication with automatic token management. Supports finding similar artists, rich metadata retrieval, and natural language music commands.

tools.name: SpotifyPlayback
tools.description: Manages current playback - get track info, start/pause/skip playback

tools.name: SpotifySearch
tools.description: Search for tracks, albums, artists, or playlists on Spotify

tools.name: SpotifyQueue
tools.description: Manage playback queue - view queue or add tracks

tools.name: SpotifyGetInfo
tools.description: Get detailed information about Spotify items (tracks, albums, artists, playlists)

tools.name: SpotifyPlaylist
tools.description: Manage playlists - list, get tracks, add/remove tracks, change details

tools.name: SpotifyEnhancedSearch
tools.description: Enhanced search combining Spotify data with external metadata from Last.fm and MusicBrainz

tools.name: SpotifySimilarArtists
tools.description: Find similar artists using Last.fm collaborative filtering data
